questions.question: In charpy impact test KU 300/5; where 300/5 indicates

answers.a: Test was conducted with 300 Joules striking energy with 5 mm deep notch
answers.b: Test was conducted with 300 Newton force with 5 mm deep notch
answers.c: Both a and b are correct
answers.d: Both a and b are incorrect

answers.a: In charpy test notch is U shaped and is placed so that it lies on compression side
answers.c: In charpy test, specimen supported horizontally in simply supported manner.
